title: LineItem
description: Line item object. Expected to use the currency of the parent object.

quantity.description: Quantity of the item being purchased.

base_amount.description: Line total before discounts (item.price x item.quantity) in minor (cents) currency units.

discount.description: Line-level discount amount in minor (cents) currency units.

subtotal.description: Line total after discounts in minor (cents) currency units.

total.description: Final line total (same as subtotal) in minor (cents) currency units.

parent_id.description: Parent line item identifier for any nested structures.
